attributes.action: Allow Richard Branson to take over from Camelot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Richard Branson has been turned down several times to run the UK Lottery.
Richard has always said that if he was to run it most if not all the monies received would be shared fairly and equally and to the most deserving areas., and winnings would be made better and fairer, I say, give him a chance

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
